slts.slt: I can mint an Andamio Learner Token.
I can commit to an Assignment.
I can see an on-chain record of my completed Assignment.
I can write Lessons with Markdown.
I can add changes to a public repository.

modules.title: Make as many Modules as you need.

slts.slt: I can write a Student Learning Target (SLT).
I can write as many SLTs as needed, for as many Modules as my Course requires.
I can create additional course modules.
I can use Module IDs to sequence course modules.
